# KtForm Maintainers

Please refer to the [Project Governance](GOVERNANCE.md) for more information on the responsibilities and privileges of being a maintainer for the project.

## KtForm Application Maintainers

https://github.com/orgs/ktform/teams/ktform-app-team

Maintain and govern `ktform-app`, `ktform-ui` and `ktform-dashboard` development.

| Maintainer   | GitHub ID                                         | Affiliation   |
|--------------|---------------------------------------------------|---------------|
| Yuriy Yarosh | [@yuriy-yarosh](https://github.com/yuriy-yarosh)  |               |


## KtForm Controller Maintainers

https://github.com/orgs/ktform/teams/ktform-ctrl-team

Maintain and govern `ktform-controller`, `ktform-scaler` and `ktform-cost-reporter` development.

| Maintainer     | GitHub ID                                               | Affiliation             |
|----------------|---------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------|
| Yuriy Yarosh   | [@yuriy-yarosh](https://github.com/yuriy-yarosh)        |                         |

## KtForm Compiler Maintainers

https://github.com/orgs/ktform/teams/ktform-client-team

Maintain and govern `ktform-client` and `ktform-compiler` development.

| Maintainer     | GitHub ID                                               | Affiliation             |
